00011 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_REF_CONTAINER_STATIC_ARRAY_DETAIL_INTERFACE_ER_2010_HPP

00015 #include <boost/mpl/int.hpp>

00019 #include <boost/range/algorithm/for_each.hpp>
00020 #include <boost/range/iterator_range.hpp> //iterator_range_detail::
00021 
00022 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/framework.hpp>
00023 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/crtp.hpp>
00024 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/detail/unwrap/range.hpp>
00025 #include <boost/assign/v2/detail/relational_op/relational_op.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/assign/v2/put/range/convert.hpp>
00027 
00028 namespace boost{
00029 namespace assign{
00030 namespace v2{
00031 namespace ref{
00032 namespace anon_aux{
00033 
00034     template<std::size_t N,typename Tag,typename T>
00035     struct interface_traits{
00036     
00037         typedef Tag assign_tag_;
00038         typedef typename ref::wrapper<assign_tag_,T> wrapper_;
00039         typedef boost::array<wrapper_,N> impl_;
00040                 typedef typename ref::result_of::unwrap_range<impl_>::type range_;
00041                 typedef typename ref::result_of::unwrap_range<
00042                 impl_ const>::type range_c_;
00043         
00044         typedef typename boost::unwrap_reference<T>::type value_type;
00045                 typedef typename boost::add_reference<value_type>::type reference;
00046         typedef typename boost::call_traits<reference>::const_reference 
00047                 const_reference;
00048         typedef typename boost::range_iterator<range_>::type iterator;
00049         typedef typename boost::range_iterator<range_c_>::type const_iterator;
00050         // wrappers
00051         #ifndef BOOST_MSVC
00052                     typedef typename boost::range_size<impl_>::type size_type;
00053         #endif
00054         #ifdef BOOST_MSVC 
00055             typedef std::size_t size_type; 
00056         #endif
00057         typedef typename boost::range_difference<range_>::type difference_type;
00058 
00059     };
00060                    
00061     // Requirements: 
00062     // D.impl()                         Returns an array of ref-wrappers
00063     // D.impl()const            Returns a const array of ref-wrappers
00064     template<std::size_t N,typename Tag,typename T,typename D>
00065     class interface 
00066       :  public relational_op_aux::crtp<
00067                 interface<N,Tag,T,D>
00068         >
00069     {
00070     
00071         typedef interface_traits<N,Tag,T> traits_;
00072         typedef typename traits_::wrapper_ wrapper_;
00073         typedef typename traits_::impl_ impl_;
00074         typedef interface<N,T,Tag,D> this_;
00075 
00076         public:
00077         typedef typename traits_::value_type value_type;
00078         typedef typename traits_::iterator iterator;
00079         typedef typename traits_::const_iterator const_iterator;
00080         typedef typename traits_::size_type size_type;
00081         typedef typename traits_::difference_type difference_type;
00082         typedef typename traits_::reference reference;
00083         typedef typename traits_::const_reference const_reference;
00084                 
00085         BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(size_type, static_size = N);
00086                                             
00087         iterator begin() 
00088         { 
00089                 return boost::begin( this->unwrap() ); 
00090         }
00091         iterator end() 
00092         { 
00093                 return boost::end( this->unwrap() ); 
00094         }
00095         const_iterator begin()const 
00096         { 
00097                 return boost::begin( this->unwrap() ); 
00098         }
00099         const_iterator end()const 
00100         { 
00101                 return boost::end( this->unwrap() ); 
00102         }
00103 
00104         size_type size() const
00105         { 
00106                 return this->impl().size(); 
00107         }
00108         bool empty() const
00109         { 
00110                 return this->impl().empty(); 
00111         }
00112                 
00113         reference operator[](size_type i)
00114         { 
00115                 return (this->impl())[i].unwrap(); 
00116         }
00117         const_reference operator[](size_type i)const
00118         { 
00119              return (this->impl())[i].unwrap(); 
00120         }
00121                         
00122         reference front()
00123         { 
00124                 return (this->impl()).front().unwrap(); 
00125         }
00126         const_reference front() const
00127         { 
00128                 return (this->impl()).front().unwrap(); 
00129         }
00130         reference back()
00131         { 
00132                 return (this->impl()).back().unwrap(); 
00133         }
00134         const_reference back() const
00135         { 
00136                 return (this->impl()).back().unwrap(); 
00137         }
00138         
00139         void swap(interface& other)
00140         { 
00141             typedef boost::mpl::int_<N> int_n_;
00142             this->swap_impl(other,int_n_());
00143         }
00144 
00145         void assign(T& val)
00146         { 
00147             impl_& ra = this->impl();
00148             boost::for_each(ra, functional::assigner<T>( val ));
00149         }
00150 
00151                 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CONVERT_CONVERT_MF
00152                 BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_CONVERT_OPERATOR_MF
00153 
00154         // Relational op
00155 
00156                 template<typename R>
00157         bool equal_to(const R& r)const{
00158                 return ::boost::iterator_range_detail::equal( 
00159                 (*this), r );
00160                 }
00161 
00162                 template<typename R>
00163         bool less_than(const R& r)const{
00164                 return ::boost::iterator_range_detail::less_than( 
00165                 (*this), r );
00166                 }
00167 
00168         protected:
00169         typedef boost::mpl::false_ false_;
00170         typedef boost::mpl::true_ true_;
00171 
00172         void swap_impl(interface& other, boost::mpl::int_<0>){}
00173 
00174         template<int N1>
00175         void swap_impl(interface& other, boost::mpl::int_<N1>)
00176         {
00177             reference lhs = (*this)[N1-1];
00178             reference rhs = (other)[N1-1];
00179             lhs.swap(rhs); 
00180             typedef boost::mpl::int_<N1-1> next_int_;
00181             this->swap_impl( other, next_int_() );
00182         }
00183         
00184         typename traits_::range_ unwrap()
00185         { 
00186                 return ref::unwrap_range( this->impl() ); 
00187         }
00188         typename traits_::range_c_ unwrap()const{       
00189                 return ref::unwrap_range( this->impl() ); 
00190         }
00191         
00192         impl_& impl(){ 
00193             return static_cast<D&>(*this).impl();
00194         }
00195 
00196         impl_ const& impl()const{ 
00197             return static_cast<const D&>(*this).impl();
00198         }
00199 
00200     };
00201 
00202 }// anon_aux
